CustomField.formula: IF( UserReference__r.Profile.Name = 'PM', 'Program Manager', IF( UserReference__r.Profile.Name = 'PO', 'Program Officer ', IF( UserReference__r.Profile.Name = 'FO', 'Fiscal Officer ', IF( UserReference__r.Profile.Name = 'FS', 'Fiscal Staff', IF( UserReference__r.Profile.Name = 'FS', 'Financial Director ', IF( UserReference__r.Profile.Name = 'FD', 'Fiscal Staff', IF( UserReference__r.Profile.Name = 'EXE', 'Executive', IF( UserReference__r.Profile.Name = 'SME', 'Subject Matter Expert Expert', IF( UserReference__r.Profile.Name = 'FS', 'Fiscal Staff', IF( UserReference__r.Profile.Name = 'DA', 'Delegated Administrator', IF( UserReference__r.Profile.Name = 'IND', 'Individual Subrecipient', IF( UserReference__r.Profile.Name = 'SPI', 'Primary Representative', IF( UserReference__r.Profile.Name = 'SPA', 'Secondary Representative', IF( UserReference__r.Profile.Name = 'VND', 'Vendor', ''))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: User Profile
